description: Shiki has sexual intercourse with all three Orifushi sisters dressed up as maids, which they call "service". The Min-Min Ice Creamery service which Natsumi runs has problems, causing Natsumi to doubt herself. She makes Shiki work hard while, her, Akina, and Mafuyu are at a festival.

titles.title: Meeting at a Festival, in a Bath and a Harem Paradise
Spotkanie podczas festiwalu, w kąpieli i haremowym raju
Tokai wa Omatsuri to Ofuro to Harem Paradise
都会はお祭りとお風呂とハーレムパラダイス
